name: Ingredient 500
description:
Space = Start

Ingredient 500 is a work in progress rogue-like game inspired by Brotato and Nuclear Throne

Move around with WASD or Arrow keys, aim with the mouse, and click to shoot. Press space to use a character's active ability. 

To-Add Section:

More waves

More bosses

More characters

Secrets

More pick-ups in game

MONSTER LOG:

Mush: Slowly moves towards you, only posing a threat in large groups.

Smush: Charges at you and then stays still before charging at you again. 

Rotballer: A small, dangerous Rotkin that can only really do damage in packs. They stand motionless and shoot Rotballs. The most recently grown one shoots all of the Rotballs, drawing its power from the rest of the Rotballers. Kill them fast!

Rotsploder: A slow moving, volatile Rotkin. Touching them causes them to violently explode in a visceral burst. They can cause a lot of pain in a single touch.

Rotto: Said to be the "root of the rot", because these pathetic creatures crawled out of the trash thrown out by humans long before the Rotkin epidemic began. You can't really find them anymore, but if you do, kill it immediately! It could just lead to creating a super rot monster that could destroy the rest of the already plagued world!

Rotmunga: A long lost beast from the past. Not much info is know about it.

Rotted Recluse: BOOM! Headshot!
